changes.description: Enhanced Ruby to Remix transition; Improved Active Record visual pattern; Refined color scheme and contrast; Enhanced tab and feature card styling
changes.reasoning: The design now better conveys the 'Active Record' pattern from Ruby/Rails visually while maintaining the Remix identity. Enhanced contrast and subtle background gradients improve readability while the more polished terminal-like code container gives a premium developer experience.

config.aiPrompt: Enhance the visual design of the Remix section to better convey the Active Record pattern while maintaining brand identity
